about_the_game:
A difficult, pixel art platformer where your goal is to reach the top! - Inspired by the fantastic Jump King and Getting Over It with Bennet Foddy!

You embark on a precision-platforming adventure in a post-apocalyptic laboratory, the route is difficult and will require patience and all of your platforming skills. Reach new heights and restore nature to this barren world... If you reach the top, you might just save the world!

- Multiple Stage Precision Platforming Adventure
One huge continuous map!
- Difficult gameplay
You will fall and faceplant... A lot!
- Constant Action
The character runs continuously, so you'll need to be quick with your reactions or find a safe space to relax.
- 1-Button Gameplay
You only need 1 button to play, press and hold to jump higher or tap for small jumps... It's accessible and easy to pick up but challenging to master!
- Hand-Drawn Pixel Graphics
I have drawn all the content in this game myself, experience the unique world of Faceplant in full hand-drawn pixel art glory!

name: Faceplant

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or newer
  • Processor: Dual Core 2.4 GhZ
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 4000
  • DirectX: Version 10

short_description: A difficult, pixel art platformer. You can't stop, but can you reach the top?
